param.name: pInfo
param.para: Pointer to a structure that receives the information about the balloon.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Obtains the preferred size,in pixels, of the balloon.

param.name: pszDefault
param.para: Pointer to a SIZE structure that contains the default size, in pixels, of the balloon.

param.name: psz
param.para: Pointer to a SIZE structure that receives the preferred balloon size, in pixels. The cy member of this structure is ignored.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

remarks.para: This method is required. The balloon must supply the preferred size in response to this method.
To obtain the font used to draw the balloon, call with DEFAULT_GUI_FONT. This font can be used to calculate the preferred balloon size at runtime.
If the balloon text will not fit into the preferred size obtained from this method, the language bar truncates the text and adds an ellipses to the text.

param.name: click
param.para: Contains one of the values that indicate which mouse button was used to click the balloon.

param.name: pt
param.para: Pointer to a POINT structure that contains the position of the mouse cursor, in screen coordinates, at the time of the click event.

param.name: prcArea
param.para: Pointer to a structure that contains the bounding rectangle, in screen coordinates, of the balloon.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

summary.para: The ITfLangBarItemBalloon interface is implemented by an application or text service and is used by the language bar manager to obtain information specific to a balloon item on the language bar.
The language bar manager obtains an instance of this interface by calling QueryInterface on the passed to with IID_ITfLangBarItemBalloon.

remarks.para: A language bar balloon acts as a pop-up notification on the language bar.
